p: Cumin essential oil supplementation enhanced some antioxidative indices, as superoxide dismutase and total antioxidant capacity in patients with metabolic syndrome [ 235]. Based on a randomized crossover trial, pomegranate juice consumption for eight weeks in hemodialysis patients resulted in beneficial effects on blood pressure, oxidative stress, inflammation, and serum lipoprotein cholesterol [ 236]. Moreover, pomegranate extract (900 mg daily) intake by colorectal cancer patients has moderate modulation of specific tissue microRNAs (colorectal cancer biomarkers) [ 237]. Studies have shown that supplementation with pomegranate juice significantly affects oxidative stress by improving antioxidant response [ 238, 239]. The oral administration of Melissa officinalis infusion markedly improved oxidative stress conditions and DNA damage that arises from radiation exposure among radiology staff [ 240].
